http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif BUCS List BUCS List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=BUCS&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=BUCS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2014-08-22T12:35:24Z Mark Farthing 2014-08-22T14:34:49+01:00 2014-08-22T14:34:49+01:00 Welcome to the BUCS Jiscmail list... https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCS;4ed5e63.1408 This has been set up as a tool for staff and sabbaticals within the HE sport sector to discuss, inform and support each other.<br><br>The list is only as relevant as the engagement within it so please ensure your colleagues within your university are signing up to it and please do contribute to the discussions as you see fit. [...]
